document_data.name: Saul
document_data.mainbody: '''Saul''' ({{Pronounce|SAWL|refs={{Cite adventurers league/City of Danger|40}}}}) was a [[halfling]] in [[Mulmaster]] in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Personality: The halfling was an inquisitive, talkative, and knowledgeable individual. He liked telling strangers all about Mulmaster.
document_data.Relationships: Saul was a servant at [[Astrid Saj]]'s house and hoped to enter into the city's Blade elite.
document_data.History: In 1491 DR, he was one of the main servants at Astrid Saj's great party in her villa.
